old: おう！　覚者様、よろしくお願いします
new: Oh!　Thank you very much, Arisen!

old: どうも。遠慮しねぇで何でも言ってくださいよ
new: Hi. Don't hesitate to tell me anything.

old: 俺の力、きっとお役に立ちますぜ
new: My power will surely be of use to you.

old: どんな戦場でも喜んで
new: I'm willing to go to any battlefield.

old: こっちの準備ぁできてます。行きますか
new: I'm ready. Shall we go?

old: きっちりお守りしますんで、ご安心を
new: We will take good care of you, don't worry.

old: おっ、この感じ。あの方が来ましたか
new: Oh, this feeling. Has that person arrived?

old: ハッ！　何とかうまくいきましたね
new: Ha! Somehow, it went well, didn't it?

old: 上出来だったと思いますがね
new: I think it went well, but...

old: 結構な成果ですよ、こいつぁ！
new: This is quite an achievement, I must say!

old: あぁ、下手うっちまいましたね。こりゃ
new: Oh, I'm so bad at this. Oh, shit.

old: お！？　悪くねぇ手ごたえだ
new: Oh?　That's not bad.

old: うおおっ！　力が漲ってきやがる
new: Wow!　I'm filled with power!

old: へっ！　次の戦闘、期待して下さいよ
new: Heh!　Next battle, you can look forward to!

old: さぁてと、どっから行きましょう？
new: So, where shall we go from here?

old: ま、何かあったらその時考えましょう
new: Well, if something happens, we'll think about it then.

old: エモノですぜ
new: It's the target

old: 敵ですよ、やりますか？
new: Are they the enemy? Will you fight?

old: 敵か？　仕方ねぇ――！
new: Enemies?　It can't be helped--

old: 舐めてかかると、痛い目見そうだな。ありゃ
new: If you underestimate me, you're in for a world of hurt. Well then...

old: チッ！　厄介そうなヤツですね
new: Tsk!　He looks like trouble.

old: すまねぇ！
new: I'm sorry!

old: 誰か、手ぇ貸してくれ！
new: Somebody give me a hand here!

old: クッ！　離しやがれ、この！
new: Kuh!　Get off me, you son of a bitch!

old: おい、冗談――だ――ろ――
new: Hey, it's just a joke, you know

old: なっ――何ぃっ！？
new: What- What's happening!?

old: 来やがったな！
new: You came!

old: へっ、やりますか！
new: Well, shall I do it?

old: お怪我ぁありませんでしたか？
new: Were you injured?

old: まっ、運動がわりにゃなりましたね
new: Well, I guess I got my exercise instead.

old: 覚者様の邪魔してんじゃねぇぞ、おう！
new: Don't get in the way of the Master of the Arisen!

old: よし、捕まえたぜ！！
new: Okay, I got you!

old: あぁ、大した怪我じゃありません
new: Oh, it's nothing serious.

old: 楽勝ってわけにゃいきませんね
new: It's not going to be an easy win.

old: つっ――気ぃ引き締めます――
new: I'm going to brace myself.

old: さすがにこりゃ、きついな――
new: This is a tough one...

old: これ以上の無理ぁ、保障できませんよ
new: I cannot guarantee any more than this, it's impossible

old: おい！！　嘘だろっ、覚者様！
new: Hey!　No way, Lord Arisen!

old: 食らわしてやる――
new: I'm gonna make you pay for this...

old: おう、回復だ！
new: Oh, recovery!

old: どこ見てやがる、相手は俺だ！！
new: Where are you looking, I'm your opponent!!

old: よし、援護する！
new: Okay, I'll cover for you!

old: あぶねぇな！
new: That's not safe!

old: おう、うらぁッ！！
new: Oh, ugh!

old: 食らいやがれッ！！
new: Take it!

old: そら、こいつでどうだ！
new: There you go. How about this one!

old: こっちだ、打ち上げる！
new: This way, I'll launch!

old: 解ったぜ！
new: Got it!

old: おう、了解！
new: Oh, got it!

old: そいつぁムリだ
new: That's impossible.

old: おっ、荷物の整理ですか？
new: Oh, are you organizing your luggage?

old: そろそろ出発ですかね？　いつでも呼んでくださいよ
new: Are we about to leave?　You can call me anytime.

old: ちったぁ休んだ方が良いですぜ
new: It's better to take a little rest, ya know

old:
なぁに、ちょっとくらいゆっくりしたところで
敵は逃げませんよ
new:
Hey, even if you slow down a little bit...
The enemy won't run away.

old: おっと、へへ――静かにしとくか――
new: Oops, heh--I'll be quiet--I'll be quiet.

old: 寝ずの番は俺にお任せを――
new: Leave the night watch to me.

old: 何というかこう、雰囲気が変わりましたね
new: The atmosphere has changed.

old: へぇ、模様替えってのもいいもんですね
new: Wow, it's nice to redecorate, isn't it?

old: 先ほどエリア探索から戻りました
new: I just returned from exploring the area.

old: 覚者様、今回のエリア探索は大収穫ですぜ！
new: Dear Arisen, this exploration of the area has been a great success!

old: ふーむ、ん？　ん～――
new: Hmm, huh? Hmm~

old: おっ、覚者様！　庭に何かいますぜ！
new: Oh, Master Arisen!　There's something in the garden!

old: よし　これくらいか――
new: Alright, this should be enough--

old: これで大暴れしてみせますぜ
new: I'm going to go on a rampage with this.

old: 気合い入れてお守りしますよ！
new: I will protect you with all my energy!

old: このスキル、はやく戦場で活かしたいもんです
new: I can't wait to put these skills to use on the battlefield!

old: ほぉー、こりゃ面白い戦い方ができそうじゃないですか
new: Wow, this should make for some interesting battles.

old: 戦いも結構ですが、休養ってのもイイですなぁ
new: Fighting is good, but rest is also good.

old: さぁてっと、今日はどこに行きますかね？
new: Let's see, where are we going today?

old: おっ、なんですか？
new: Whoa, what is it?

old: どうしたんです？　覚者様
new:
Master Arisen,
What's wrong?

old: 何が来たってお守りします！
new: We will protect you no matter what comes your way!

old: この間、他所でクラフトの手伝いをしたら喜ばれましたよ！
new: I helped with crafts elsewhere the other day and it was appreciated!

old:
先日、別の覚者様に呼ばれて
ちょっくら冒険のお供をしてきましたぜ
new:
The other day, I was invited by another Arisen person
to accompany him on a little adventure!

old: そう言や、別の覚者様に褒められましたよ、俺のこの装備！
new: By the way, I was praised by another Arisen for this equipment of mine!

old: 覚者様、今日は俺から戦技のご提案をさせてもらえませんかね！
new: Arisen, may I propose a combat technique to you today?

old:
覚者様に従ってきたおかげで
俺の意思疎通力が上がったんで！
new:
Thanks to following the Arisen
My communication skills have improved!

old: 覚者様、今日は俺から髪型のご提案があるんですよ！
new: Dear Arisen, I have a haircut suggestion for you today!

old:
覚者様、新しい家財を入手されたんですか！
こりゃぁいいや！
new:
Dear Master, did you get new household goods?
That's good!

old: おっ、覚者様！　お帰りですか！
new: Oh, Master!　You are back!

old: 覚者様がご無事で何より！
new: I am glad to hear that you are safe and sound, Arisen!

old: 長いことお戻りにならねぇんで、心配してたんですよ
new: I was worried because you didn't come back for a long time

old: ふぅ、無事帰ってこられましたね！
new: Phew, you made it back safely!

old: やっぱ家ってのはいいもんですねぇ、力が抜けるや
new: It's nice to be at home, isn't it?

old: ここにゃ敵は入ってこれません、休憩していきますか？
new: The enemy can't get in here. Shall we take a break?

old: ボードクエストやら依頼やら、ぬかり無く見ときましょう
new: Let's look at all the board quests and requests.

old: さーて、次に備えてキッチリ準備しねぇと
new: Well, I'd better get ready for the next one.

old: 今行きますぜ！
new: I'm on my way!

old: おっと、覚者様！　待っててください
new: Oh, Arisen! Please wait.

old: さっ、これで！
new: Here we go!

old: 俺がついてます！
new: I'm with you!

old: ふん、怒ってやがる！　気を付けねぇとな！
new: He's angry!　I gotta be careful!

old: 興奮してるみてぇですね！　攻撃には注意してくださいよ！
new: It looks agitated!　Be careful of the attacks!

old: へっ、隙ありってな！
new: Mm, there's an opening!

old: ダウンしたぜ！　全力で行ってやりましょうや！
new: It's down! Let's go all out and do it!

old: 俺の揺さぶりに耐えられるかぁ？！
new: Can you withstand my shaking?!

new: I see, now all weaknesses are exposed!

old: 弱点を叩くってのはな、戦いの基本だぜ！
new: Hitting the weak points is the basis of battle, you know!

old: この技で支援しますぜ！　反撃しましょうや！
new: I'll support you with this technique!　Let's counterattack!

old: あいつの能力、下げてやりますかね！
new: Shall I lower his abilities?

old: 属性を付与！　これで攻撃してみてください！
new: Improved attributes! Please try attacking now!

old: 渾身の力で――喰らわすぜ――！
new: I'll strike you with all my might!

old: この技を使うときが来るとはな！　覚悟しろよ！
new: I never thought I'd see the time to use this technique!　Brace yourself!

new: <COL B6FF01>《Special Skill》I'll do it. I'll take care of it!</COL>

new: <COL B6FF01>《Concentration》Now, let's concentrate.</COL>

old: <COL B6FF01>《無恐》へっ――つまらねぇ攻撃なんぞ無視だ</COL>

old: 覚者さま、新しい特技、閃めきましたぜ
new: Dear Arisen, I've got an idea for a new skill.

new: Lord Arisen, there are training enemies!

どうも近くに貴重な財宝が

覚者さま、

Just a moment please...

new: I wonder if there's something around here.

こいつは珍しいヤツだ、
ありがたくぶちのめしましょうや

new: Wow, that's an enemy you don't see very often.

new: It's like my mentor is taking care of me.

せっかくですから

new:
Since you're here,
please take your time!

new: Leave it to me.

new: If the Arisen says so

new: This guy can fix it!

new: Oops!

new: Missed.

なぁ覚者様、俺を見込んで
ひとつ頼まれてくださいませんかね――
なに、悪い話じゃあありません
new:
Hey, Master, in recognition of me,
I wonder if you could do me a favor...
No, it's not a bad idea.

old:
覚者様、手に入れたこの力で、
今までよりもお力になれるはずです――
お任せくだせぇ
new:
Arisen, with the power I have obtained, 
I should be able to be of more help than before―― 
Please entrust it to me.

old:
そろそろ出掛けますか？
俺がキッチリお支えしますぜ
